title: Bug 7873Bogus error messages
SR: Create a Project Test with a folder "COM".2. Create a Project Test2 with a folder "com".3. Select "COM" from Step 1, copy it to Test2.You get an error dialog:An error occurred while copying resources.Reason:Status<==== bogus, what does "Status" mean?4.Same thing happens if you try to a folder with the same name AND the errordialog has the incorrect action information (the dialog is titled "Copy" insteadof "Move" and its error message says error "copying", not "moving").
